alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Rusk; Smith; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 6:41AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Smith, southwestern Marion, western Harrison, northwestern Rusk, southeastern Upshur, Gregg and north central Cherokee Counties through 745 AM CST... At 641 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Troup, or 10 miles southeast of Whitehouse, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Longview, Marshall, Henderson, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Gladewater, Hallsville, Overton, Troup, Ore City, New London, Arp, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Harleton, Diana, Mount Selman, Liberty City and Joinerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Rusk; Smith; Upshur
